name: Rhythm Game (JachymT)
description:
NOTE : If notes bug out or go invisible, change the note speed and reload the game.

RHYTHM GAME is a two key, taiko style rhythm game featuring video game music.

Have fun :)

Controls:

Hit top notes : Z, F or G

Hit bottom notes : X, J or H

Go back : Escape

Go forward : Enter

Menus : WASD, arrow keys or mouse

The full code for the game:

https://github.com/JachymT/RhythmGame

Uses music from Undertale, Celeste, Mario Cart Wii and OMORI
